titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Andrew Lang Collection
titlestmt.author: by Beinecke Staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 06:13

did.unittitle: Andrew Lang collection

repository.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.abstract: The collection contains autograph letters, signed, written by Andrew Lang to acquaintances and colleagues, a photograph of Lang, and a small group of autograph manuscripts.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Acquired by gift and purchase from various sources, 1946-2005. Acquisition information appears at the folder level.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Andrew Lang Collection is the physical property of the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University. Literary rights, including copyright, belong to the authors or their legal heirs and assigns. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Andrew Lang Collection. General Collection, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collections are processed to a variety of levels, depending on the work necessary to make them usable, their perceived research value, the availability of staff, competing priorities, and whether or not further accruals are expected. The library attempts to provide a basic level of preservation and access for all collections, and does more extensive processing of higher priority collections as time and resources permit.
This finding aid was produced from previously existing cards in the Manuscripts Catalog and accession records. All pertinent bibliographical information has been retained.
This collection includes materials previously identified by the following call numbers: MS Vault Lang, MS Vault File Lang, Uncat MS Vault 97, Uncat MS Vault 233.

bioghist.head: Andrew Lang (1844-1912)
bioghist.p: Scottish author, folklorist, historian, and literary critic.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains autograph letters, signed, written by Andrew Lang to acquaintances and colleagues, a photograph of Lang, and a small group of autograph manuscripts.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized into two series: I. Letters, 1881-1912. II. Writings, 1894-1898.

did.unittitle: Letters

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series I is arranged in alphabetical order by recipient; unidentified recipients appear at the end.

did.unittitle: To Mr. Bell (3) and to Mrs. Bell, with an ink sketch of a castle on last page, and to "Hill"; autograph letters (5), signed

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Accompanied by typescripts of "Over the Wall" and "Mr. Carlyle as a Sentimentalist," by Andrew Lang; photograph by J. Farquhar of Aberdeen of Andrew Lang's gravestone; printed leaflet about the Memorial to Andrew Lang at the University of St. Andrews, with printed image of the Lang memorial tablet.
